name: mr.mochis cabin panic
description:
in a fantasy world where two mr.mochis are camping... will they freeze too death or will they live through the night?

okay i get it this game aint that serious so ill make this description just as non-serious

guide the fire spirits using your cursor  (they run away from it not towards it btw)

grab the fire spirits using the left click button

the mr.mochis an take only take a set amount of  hits each (and no the mr.mochis sticking around isnt a glitch they are meant too take hits too make the game harder/easier)

the difficultys set the mr.mochis health

easy: 6 hearts each

medium: 3 hearts each

hard: 2 hearts each

impossible: 1 heart each

all assets were made by: kenny, Pzuh, grafixkid, and pixel frog
